title: ACCIDENT SENDS ILLEGALS FLEEING
body:
A truck carrying 60 illegal immigrants overturned on a mountain road Saturday, killing one and sending dozens 
more fleeing into the desert.
Ten people were hurt in the wreck and three of those fleeing were injured when they fell into an old mine shaft. 
Authorities said they had not determined how the accident happened east of Phoenix. The 60 adults were riding on 
the partially enclosed back of a flatbed truck, said Dave Trombi of the Maricopa County sheriff's office. Most who 
fled were found hiding in a cave.
